entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArrayPoolEventSource.BufferDropped event is not documented at learn.microsoft.com. #96199
  • [browser][MT] MutexTests - operation does not support unaligned accesses #96191
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deadlock in System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests #96190
    9.0.0
  • Custom InterpolatedStringHandler with a DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler performs worse than one with a StringBuilder when not enabled #96188
  • [NativeAOT] No usable version of libssl was found on linux-bionic-arm64 #96184
  • Memory footprint decreases when application is launched as a console, but does not when launched through a Windows service #96179
  • Why do HttpHeaders.GetValues() throw when header does not exist? #96176
  • [NativeAOT] Method overrides with covariant return type don't work in all cases #96175
  • NativeAOT stackalloc returning garbage in AggressiveInlining method #96174
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deadlock in BrowserWebSocket when used from multiple threads #96173
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: GFNI Intrinsics #96170
  • Optimize `Vector*<*>.WithElement(variable, variable)` with `vpbroadcast* *mm* {k*}` #96163
    Future
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchI.MulMatrix #96194
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchI.LogicArray #96195
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 16 Regressions on 12/12/2023 7:40:56 AM #96193
  • [API Proposal]: AVX-512 `VPOPCNTDQ` and `BITALG` Intrinsics #96162
  • [feature-request] Full managed Quic implement #96161
  • Native aot regression in .net 8.0 (Expression tree + ReadOnlySpan) #96160

Closed

  • I'm getting System.MissingMethodException when using netstandard2.0 project from net8.0 #96197
  • failure assigning ulong to decimal #96152
  • [runtime-jit-experimental] Assertion failed 'loops->NumLoops() == 0' #96145
    9.0.0
  • TLS session resumption on Linux clients using client-side certificates #96164
  • [PGO] assert "Mismatch in align instruction." #95755
    9.0.0
  • SqlServer Operations too slow in Ubuntu #96171
  • Remove use of virtual calls in handle table #11532
    Future
  • EventSource improvements for text logging #12730
    Future
  • [Fuzzlyn] Assertion failed '!"Unexpected bbKind"' #96146
    9.0.0
  • DateTime format uses a non standard space character when running in a Docker Linux container #96022
  • Wrong display of ShortDatePattern (en-CA) on Debian 12 (bookworm) #95974

PullRequests

Created

  • Manually optimize a rem 64 instruction to avoid regression on Mono #96203
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, runtime-mono, community-contribution
  • superpmi: fix failureLimit #96202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64: Add IF_SVE_DT_3A, IF_SVE_DU_3A, IF_SVE_DX_3A, IF_SVE_DY_3A #96201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Various no-diff cleanups and debugging additions/fixes #96200
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][browser] Fix WASM README path #96198
    area-Build-mono
  • Change regMaskTP to struct with 1 field #96196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: reduce switch sizes in emitIns_R_R_R #96192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix ProcessWaitingTests.WaitChain and ProcessWaitingTests.Wa… #96187
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, community-contribution, arch-riscv, 9.0.0
  • Longer item expiry for debug builds in System.Runtime.Caching.Tests #96186
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, community-contribution
  • Avoid options field allocation in UnnamedOptionsManager #96185
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Propagate localsinit flag from callees #96180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use a sorted module order for metadata generation #96168
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Make sorting of modules more stable in the compiler #96167
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Precise reflection-visible delegate target analysis #96166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix idle HTTP/2 connection KeepAliveTimeout teardown #96158
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x

Merged

  • JIT: Generalize check for cycles when finding loops #96153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change impImportLeave to directly import BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET #96159
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix idle HTTP/2 connection KeepAliveTimeout teardown #96157
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBF_NONE_QUIRK check in loop alignment #95999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix culture-dependent ToString in illink tests #96172
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AR_4A, IF_SVE_AS_4A #96165
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm] Browser.targets: Fix .dlls being deployed to `publish/` #96045
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Extract `src/mono/browser` from `src/mono/wasm` #95940
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add emitUnitTests.sh #96064
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95870
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.2
  • Handle `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` block kind when checking for loop exit #96147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add dumpers for new loop data structures #96080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    tenet-performance, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix unhandled exception with no managed frames #96138
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NO MERGE][Mono] ready levels #95927
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix crash when processing aliases that do not point at names #96048
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: remove bound check for negated ranges #96123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change Native AOT ThreadBuffer.m_threadId to OS thread id #96120
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IH_3A` to `SVE_JO_3A` #95994
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [WIP][mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix bug in label printing in disasm #96136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
  • [mono][jit] Optimize the experimental-gshared-mrgctx code #96104
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use Binary Search Tree for Frozen Collections length buckets strategy #94768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Adding osx-arm64 Mono Interpreter runtime tests job to extra-platforms #96023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Simplify codegen for div/mod #96068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96139
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [release/8.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96148
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96149
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clarify OS and Arch ownership #95972
    area-Meta
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix potential NREs in ConfigurationBindingGenerator #96078
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
